Q_TITLE.label: dataset title
Q_TITLE.description: Short description that will identify the dataset on public pages. A clear and concise formula for the title would be like: {methodology} of {organism}: {sample info} e.g. RNA-Seq of mus musculus: adult female spleen

Q_STUDY_TYPE.label: Type of study
Q_STUDY_TYPE.description: Type of the study in a controlled vocabulary

Q_STUDY_ABSTRACT.label: Abstract of the study
Q_STUDY_ABSTRACT.description: Abstract of a study as it could appear in a publication

Q_GEO_LOC_NAME.label: geographic location (country and/or sea,region)
Q_GEO_LOC_NAME.description: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by the country or sea name followed by specific region name. Country or sea names should be chosen from the INSDC country list (http://insdc.org/country.html), or the GAZ ontology (v 1.512) (http://purl.bioontology.org/ontology/GAZ)

Q_ISOL_GROWTH_CONDT.label: isolation and growth condition
Q_ISOL_GROWTH_CONDT.description: Publication reference in the form of pubmed ID (pmid), digital object identifier (doi) or url for isolation and growth condition specifications of the organism/material

Q_ISOLATE.label: Organism group sampled
Q_ISOLATE.description: Organism group: identification or description of the specific individual from which this sample was obtained

Q_PHENOTYPE.label: Phenotype ontology
Q_PHENOTYPE.description: Experimental Ontology Factor accession for phenotype

Q_AGE.label: Age at sampling time
Q_AGE.description: age at the time of sampling; relevant scale depends on species and study, e.g. could be seconds for amoebae or centuries for trees

Q_SAMPLE_TYPE.label: Sample type
Q_SAMPLE_TYPE.description: Sample type, such as cell culture, mixed culture, tissue sample, whole organism, single cell, metagenomic assembly

Q_ORGANISM.label: Descriptive organism name
Q_ORGANISM.description: The most descriptive organism name for this sample (to the species, if possible). It is OK to submit an organism name that is not in our database. In the case of a new species, provide the desired organism name, and our taxonomists may assign a provisional taxID. In the case of unidentified species, choose the appropriate Genus and include 'sp.', e.g., 'Escherichia sp.'. When sequencing a genome from a non-metagenomic source, include a strain or isolate name too, e.g., 'Pseudomonas sp. UK4'. For more information about providing a valid organism, including new species, metagenomes (microbiomes) and metagenome-assembled genomes, see https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/biosample/docs/organism/.

Q_TISSUE.label: Organism part sampled
Q_TISSUE.description: Type of tissue the sample was taken from.

Q_SEX.label: sex as physical sex (X and Y chromosome count)

Q_LIBRARY_STRATEGY.label: library strategy
Q_LIBRARY_STRATEGY.description: Controlled vocabulary of terms describing overall strategy of the library. Terms used by TCGA include {WGS, WXS*, RNA-Seq*}

Q_LIBRARY_SOURCE.label: library source
Q_LIBRARY_SOURCE.description: Controlled vocabulary of terms describing starting material from the sample. Terms used by TCGA include {GENOMIC, TRANSCRIPTOMIC*}

Q_LIBRARY_SELECTION.label: library selection
Q_LIBRARY_SELECTION.description: Controlled vocabulary of terms describing selection or reduction method use in library construction. Terms used by TCGA include {Random, Hybrid Selection}

Q_INSTRUMENT_MODEL.label: instrument model
Q_INSTRUMENT_MODEL.description: Controlled vocabulary of instrument models {Illumina Genome Analyzer II, etc}

Q_DESIGN_DESCRIPTION.label: design description
Q_DESIGN_DESCRIPTION.description: Free-form description of the methods used to create the sequencing library; a brief 'materials and methods' section.

Q_PAIRED_NOMINAL_LENGTH.label: Paired nominal length
Q_PAIRED_NOMINAL_LENGTH.description: Average distance between the paired reads in a base pair

Q_PAIRED_NOMINAL_SDEV.label: Paired nominal standard deviation
Q_PAIRED_NOMINAL_SDEV.description: standard deviation of distance between the paired reads in a base pair

Q_CHECKSUM_METHOD.label: checksum method
Q_CHECKSUM_METHOD.description: Used checksum method to encrypt the file to be uploaded

Q_ASSEMBLY.label: ncbi assembly name or accession number
Q_ASSEMBLY.description: This is only if you are submitting a bam file aligned against a NCBI assembly. Please provide NCBI name or accession number (e.g. GRCh37)
